full_summary:
===============

### Tender Announcement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment

#### Project Title
----------------

,title-titre-eng, 6D063-226031 Tubes
#### Project Reference
----------------

*Reference Number*, WS4015113216
#### Solicitation Information
-------------------------

* Amendment Number:, 2
* Solicitation Number:, WS4015113216
* Publication Date:, Tuesday, June 7, 2023
* Tender Closing Date and Time:, Friday, June 30, 2023, 2:00 pm EDT
* Amendment Date:, Thursday, June 14, 2023
* Contract Start Date:, Monday, July 1, 2024
* Contract End Date:, No end date specified

#### Project Description
-----------------

This is an amendment to the original tender announcement. Please disregard the closing times listed in the Discovery posting and CanadaBuys posting. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the revised tender closing date.

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites companies to submit bids for laboratory and scientific equipment, specifically tubes, under the solicitation number WS4015113216.

#### Contract Information
-------------------

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address:, 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5
* Country:, Canada
* End User Entity:, Public Health Agency of Canada
* Address:, 130 Colonnade Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K9, Canada

#### Trade Agreements
------------------

This tender is open to companies operating under the following trade agreements:

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

#### Tender Information
-------------------

* Tender Status:, Expiré (Expired)
* Regions of Opportunity:, None
* Regions of Delivery:, Winnipeg, Manitoba
* Notice URL: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16517357?extsite=MTY1MTczNTdfQU4wMT
